column1: in memory of lavern andrew marquardt| first: last: born: october 30
column12: 2015. a mass of christian burial will be at 10:00 a. m.
column15: 2015 at immaculate conception catholic church in watertown. visitation will be monday from 4-7:00 p. m. with a scripture service at 6:30 followed by a rosary. interment will be at esterly cemetery. a full obituary to follow.
